---
name: Maintenance Report
about: Report a maintenance or housekeeping task
title: "Maintenance: "
labels: maintenance
assignees: ''

---

**Description**
A clear and concise description of the maintenance task.

**Scope**
What parts of the project does this task affect? (e.g. specific files, dependencies, workflows)

**Expected Outcome**
What do you hope to achieve with this maintenance task?

**Priority**
How urgent is this task? (Low/Medium/High/Critical)

**Additional Context**
Add any other context about the maintenance task here.
